introduction: Colleen Blake - author, who creatively blocked. His wife forces him to rent an isolated country house, to find inspiration.Soon they learn that the house has a dirty history, this former brothel.Colin begins to write with ease, because the Ghost of the former owner, Stella, inspires him with tales of debauchery.Now Colin is unable to distinguish reality from the past...(机译)科琳布雷克 - 作家，谁创造性地阻止。他的妻子迫使他租一个孤立的乡村别墅，找到inspiration.Soon他们知道房子有一个肮脏的历史，这个前brothel.Colin开始轻松写，因为前老板，斯特拉，的鬼激发他debauchery.Now科林的故事是无法从过去的区分现实...
